title: Rioter to play with me for my 1000th regular win?
body:
I think this would be the right area to post this. Any non-busy reds around at night (usually 11pm pst-1am) to throw down with a lowly Gold 4 support main to snatch up my 1k Win??

Thanks in advance.
Yoshi

replies.body:
Great. Thanks Kateykhaos! I'll be around this evening (sunday) if you're free. 

Yoshi
